scenario_text.value:
Sheesh, where could Aoi and Kaito have run
off to?

You were with them for a minute back there,
right, Takuma?
Yeah...

Aoi went off on her own, and Labramon went
after her.

I was sure Kaito would make his way back here
by now...

He was worried about Aoi too, huh? Maybe he
went to see how she’s doing?

Who knows... He’s the one that told us to
give her some space in the first place...
Think they’re on a date or something?
Minoru!

Oops, I guess now’s not the time for that
joke...
Real talk, though, where’d they head off to?

Man... Running off while I got my hands full
with the kiddies. How selfish can ya get?!
My bad, seriously!
Kaito! Where’d you go?!

We were biting our nails over here since you
didn’t come back, ya jerk!
Yeah, Kaito!

I’m sorry already, but now’s not the time for
this!
Why, did something happen?
Haru... He’s back.
What?!
Are, are you certain?!
I’m certain. I saw him with my own eyes.

My word... Is this somehow related to the
absence of Aoi and Labramon?

The two of them went chasing after that
weirdo.
What? Chased him where?!

I don’t know...but they definitely headed
east.
East? You mean over towards the library?
The library...?

You mean that new building you said popped 
up in the woods?!
What?! A new building, for real?!

Oh, I mean I just heard the professor mention
it, is all...
Oh my. This could be a problem!

That place only just appeared. The Master’s
servants may very well wish to investigate!

That means they’re in danger, right?!
We’ve gotta go save them!
Yeah!
Uh, hold your horses!
Huh?

Doesn’t this seem the least bit fishy to you
guys?
Fishy? Fishy how?

I mean... Haru just shows up again, out of
nowhere...

Then he heads straight for the mysterious new
library? Smells super fishy to me.
Minoru!
You saying you’re suspicious of Haru?!

Just look at what happened with Miyuki! He
could be working for the bad guys already...

Perish the thought! But no, not that boy...
Anyone but Haru...

The chances are slim...but they ain’t zero.
He could be brainwashed, for all we know.
But...

I getcha. We can’t go leaping to any
conclusions without proof.

Besides...even if it is a trap, we can’t just
abandon Aoi and Labramon, can we?
(Kaito’s on the mark, here.)

(We can’t just forget about Aoi and
Labramon.)

(Still, I get where Minoru’s coming from.
Haru might’ve ended up like Miyuki...)

(And the sudden appearance of that library
worries me, too.)
(Right now, I think we should...)
Save Aoi and Labramon.
Chase after Haru.
Explore the library.

Between Haru and that library, there’s plenty
of unknowns here.

Still, the one thing we do know is that we’ve
gotta go save Aoi and Labramon.
I think so, too!

Me, too! We’ve gotta go help them, no matter
what!

You all talk like there’s some other option
here. ’Course this is the way forward.
Tch, I knew that!

Why Haru headed for the library...and why he
didn’t come back to us...

I think we should follow him and figure those
things out.

And what should we do if he’s joined Team
Douchebag?
We won’t know until we see him!

In other words...the rescue of Aoi and
Labramon is an inevitable necessity...
Indubitably.

Works for me. Just means we gotta go either
way.

That library just appeared out of nowhere...
Don’t you think we should check it out?
You care more about that library than Aoi?

That’s not it. I just figured we really should
look into it...

So go save Aoi and Labramon, but ALSO
check out the library while we’re at it?
Yeah, exactly.

Okay, well if that’s the case then I’m on
board!
Now that we’re all in, we’d better get goin’.
Yeah! Let’s head to the library, everyone!
